author: Anonymous Scale
title: copy test (lecture 03.03 Module 8)
question:
Hi, I am having a hard time wrapping my head around what is Copy test.
said fold function is taking the function apart, so copy test is putting them back in the same way.  I am still not sure what is the meaning of it.
Could anyone elaborate more about it?
student_answer: A copy test for the fold-course function consumes a course and returns the exact same course. There, it would consume C110 and return C110.
